meanings.definition: A person or thing that pearls.
meanings.sent1: The oyster was a pearler, creating beautiful pearls.
meanings.sent2: She found a rare pearler while diving for treasures in the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The little clam wanted to be a pearler when it grew up.
meanings.sent4: The necklace shimmered like a pearler in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The jewelry store displayed the most exquisite pearler in the window.

meanings.definition: A remarkable or outstanding example of something.
meanings.sent1: The sunset was a real pearler, painting the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: Her performance on stage was a true pearler, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent3: The cake she baked was a pearler, making everyone crave more.
meanings.sent4: The book she wrote was a literary pearler, touching the hearts of many.
meanings.sent5: The view from the mountaintop was a natural pearler, breathtaking in its beauty.
